value.title: Inflection AI collects about $1.3 billion during a fundraising round
value.excerpt: Inflection AI, a Palo Alto-based artificial intelligence platform, announced that it has completed its fundraising and it amounts to about $1.3 billion. Supposedly this was led by Microsoft, Reid Hoffman,

value.title: Inflection lands $1.3B investment to build more ‘personal’ AI
value.excerpt: Inflection AI, an AI startup aiming to build more 'personal' AI assistants, has raised $1.3 billion at a $4 billion valuation.

value.title: New AI Chip Export Rules Put Semiconductor Firms in Spotlight
value.excerpt: The simmering Sino-U.S. geopolitical tensions have taken a new dimension, with reports emerging that the Biden administration is mulling new export control measures to regulate the flow of AI chips to China.

value.title: U.S. considers tightening restrictions on AI chip exports
value.excerpt: The potential restrictions would include further clamping down on the level of the computing power of chips that are available to be exported to foreign markets in China.

value.title: US Planning for New Restrictions on AI Chip Exports to China
value.excerpt: US may halt shipments of chips made by Nvidia, Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), and other chip companies to customers in China as early as July.

value.title: US Mulls Even Tighter Restrictions to Stop AI Chips From Reaching China
value.excerpt: The US is considering even harsher export restrictions to prevent China from obtaining cutting-edge chips used to power AI programs. The US Commerce Department could implement the new export controls as soon as next month,

value.title: Nvidia sweeps AI benchmarks, but Intel brings meaningful competition
value.excerpt: Intel is building a mutli-thousand-chip cluster internally based on its Gaudi AI accelerator, the company said, which could be even bigger competition for Nvidia down the road.

value.title: Google Stakes A Claim To All Things Generative AI

value.title: U.S. Considers New Curbs on AI Chip Exports to China
value.excerpt: Restrictions come amid concerns that China could use AI chips from Nvidia and others for weapon development and hacking.

value.title: Nvidia Leads Premarket Slump In Chipmaker Shares—As White House Reportedly Mulls Fresh Curbs On AI Chips
value.excerpt: The Biden administration is planning to expand its curbs on the export of AI chips to China and other nations, the Wall Street Journal reported.

value.title: Chinese A.I. stocks fall as U.S. reportedly weighs curbs on chip exports
value.excerpt: China's AI stocks fell Wednesday after The Wall Street Journal reported that the U.S. is planning to impose more chip restrictions

value.title: Nvidia, AMD stocks fall on report of new U.S. ban on AI chip exports to China
value.excerpt: Nvidia and AMD shares slumped in the extended session Tuesday following a report that the Biden administration might ban more AI chip sales to China.

value.title: Edge AI will shape all aspects of MediaTek business

value.title: Brilliant Labs puts AI in front of your eye with its tiny open source AR lens

value.title: Samsung to mass produce HBM chips for AI, competing with SK Hynix
value.excerpt: Samsung is set to mass-produce high-bandwidth memory (HBM) chips for AI applications, aiming to outpace SK Hynix in the market.

value.title: AI will change software development in massive ways, says MongoDB CTO
value.excerpt: AI, especially the generative sort, is going to "let developers write code at the quality and the speed and the completeness that we've always wanted to," says Mark Porter.

value.title: Databricks Acquires MosaicML To Make Generative AI More Accessible
value.excerpt: The acquisition of MosiacML marks one of the first major acquisition deals in the emerging generative AI market.

value.title: Chip startup rides AI frenzy to become top-gaining topix stock
value.excerpt: Socionext Inc. has jumped more than 245% this year, with its market value touching a high of around ¥957 billion ($6.7 billion), making it the best-performing stock on the Topix index.

value.title: AI chip giant Nvidia 'extremely likely' to invest in Europe
value.excerpt: The CEO of Nvidia on Friday said that the world's most valuable chipmaker is "extremely likely" to invest in Europe.

value.title: Google's Duet AI can generate custom templates in Sheets
